title: Planted Steak Sandwich
instructions: Season the planted.steak generously with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes.
Heat a cast-iron skillet over high heat. Add oil and sear the steak for 2-3 minutes per side until deeply caramelized.
In the same pan, add sliced onions and cook until caramelized, about 8-10 minutes. Season with salt.
Slice a ciabatta or hoagie roll and toast lightly. Spread with garlic aioli or horseradish cream.
Slice the planted.steak thinly against the grain.
Layer the steak slices on the bread, top with caramelized onions, peppery arugula, and sliced tomatoes.
Close the sandwich, slice in half, and serve immediately with crispy fries or a side salad.
